Print No. 424. Aquatint: "This representation of His Majesty's Ship Majestic, 57 Guns, John Hayes, Esq. Captain, ..."

Full title: "This representation of His Majesty's Ship Majestic, 57 Guns, John Hayes, Esq. Captain, meeting with Two French Frigates, an American Private Ship of War, a Spanish Lima Ship, -& a Brig on the 3rd of Feby. 1814, in Latde.. 37. N. and Longde.. 20. W. â€“ and Capturing one of the Frigates: - Is by Gracious Permission, dedicated to His Most Excellent Majesty William IVth by His Majesty's Faithful Subject & Servant, John Hayes, Capt. R.N. C. B." Painted by Gilbert. Engd. By C. Hunt. (Ackermann & Co Exect)
